articles.description: Jarrod Bowen scores his first senior hat-trick to ease the pressure on West Ham manager David Moyes as his side claim a much-needed Premier League win over Brentford.
articles.title: Bowen hat-trick gives West Ham win over Brentford

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says Jack Grealish will return to his starting line-up on a regular basis when his performances improve.
articles.title: Grealish must improve to return to side - Guardiola

articles.description: Everton's 10-point deduction for breaching Premier League financial rules is reduced on appeal.
articles.title: Everton punishment reduced to six points

articles.description: England should not be too disappointed despite defeat by India in Ranchi condemning Ben Stokes to his first series loss as captain, writes Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: 'All not lost for England - Bashir looks the real deal'

articles.description: Great Britain's Andy Murray suggests he may only have a "few months" left of his tennis career after earning his second win of 2024 in Dubai.
articles.title: Andy Murray: Briton suggests he may only have few months left of career

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who has forced his manager to play him? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Clinical Ellis Simms scores a first-half hat-trick for Coventry to end Maidstone's hopes of landing another piece of FA Cup history.
articles.title: Simms hat-trick sees Coventry end Maidstone's cup run

articles.description: Nottingham Forest's Premier League financial breach case will be heard on Thursday and Friday, 7 and 8 March.
articles.title: Forest financial breach case to be heard next week

articles.description: BBC Sport's chief F1 writer Andrew Benson answers your questions before the 2024 season opener in Bahrain this weekend.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Andrew Benson answers your questions before the start of the 2024 season

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what happens next after Everton's appeal and if there will still be a chaotic ending to the Premier League season.
articles.title: Will there still be 'chaos' at end of Premier League season?
